Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Southbound Reroute near Halsted/43rd
ShortDescription: Southbound 8 Halsted buses are rerouted via Halsted, Root, Normal, 43rd, Union, 47th then normal route on Halsted, due to construction near Halsted/43rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Root, Normal, 43rd, Union, 47th then resume their normal route on Halsted, due to construction near Halsted/43rd.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #44 Wallace/Racine Temporary Southbound Reroute near Halsted/43rd
ShortDescription: Southbound 44 Wallace/Racine buses are rerouted via Wallace, Root, Normal, 43rd, Union, then normal route on 47th due to construction near Halsted/43rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound  #44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Wallace, Root, Normal, 43rd, Union, then resume their normal route on 47th due to construction near Halsted/43rd.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at Addison
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing at Addison due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing at Addison due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
